name: CKDStage4above
title: CKD stage4above
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnosis terms representing stage 4 and above of chronic kidney disease. The intent of this valueset is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of CKD stage 4 and above for hypoglycemia risk clinical driver),(Data Element Scope: CONDITION: CLINICAL_DRIVER:),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes stage 4 above of chronic kidney disease diagnosis that represent impaired kidney function and end stage renal disease, ckd in hypertension, diabetes, ckd in pregnancy, childbirth and pueperium),(Exclusion Criteria: CKD Stage 1, 2, 3 diagnosis codes are excluded.)
